THE TOTAL MAXIMUM LOAD FOR NITROGEN IN THE NEUSE RIVER IS 6.76 MILLION LBS/YR TN.
TMDL = WLA + LA + MOS
TMDL = 1.64 MILLION LBS/YR + 5.12 MILLION LBS/YR + 0 = 6.76 MILLION LBS/YR TN.
